name: Bloodloss (jamie of rivia)
description:
Bloodloss

Movement: A D or LEFT RIGHT
Jump/Fly Up: Spacebar
Fly Up/Fly Down: W S or UP DOWN
Transform: E
Pause Game: Esc

The aim is to stay alive as long as possible, while your blood bar is running out. Collect blood and avoid the vampire hunter! Transform yourself into a bat to fly, but beware that you lose blood faster when you are transformed.

"Bloodloss" is my submission to the Mini Jam 118: Vampires. It focuses both on the theme Vampires and the limitation "Blood is lethal." While I have been doing game development for a while, this is the first game I have published on Itch.io and the first game jam I have participated in! All the code and art is made by me and has been produced in the last 2 days. Sadly, I have not added sound or music, but who knows, maybe I will in the future! Thank you for playing and have a spooky halloween <3
